m :  i really enjoyed that tv special about whales last night .  did you get home in time to see it ?
w :  well  yes .  but i wish i could have stayed awake long enough to see the whole thing .

question: what does the woman mean ?
choice: she fell asleep before the program ended .
she especially enjoyed the end of the program .
she missed the beginning of the program .
answer: she fell asleep before the program ended .
